items.sentence: Instead of a tree, in Spain it's traditional to put up a nativity scene for Christmas.
When we have a family argument, my husband always sides with his mother instead of me.
For the time being, Tom is living in Australia, and his wife is living in New Zealand.
If you could go back and start your life again, from what age would you like to start?
You don't need to speak to Tom in sign language, because he can read lips really well.
